sentence: No longer the hip place it once was it has to rely on drawing customers in with low prices or unique events
I was supposed to have a business meeting over Skype which was impossible to get working
This includes a spa that is outrageously expensive with no discount offers a rehab pool that was closed and a night club that you could only book for private events
Two out of three pools closed entire week but opened for private functions at night
Walking distance to the T M arena
Overall this is a good place to stay if you are seeing a show at one of the casino venues or just want to experience the rock n roll hotel and casino
There are also areas on the second and third floor that run the length of the venue
I was not able to get a room due to the event
We Got a discount at 70 because they closed the pool one Day from 4 pm to host some guess from a concention
At the time of our stay the main pool was closed for private events
Great little venue

The check in process was very excellent coz the staff was very friendly and answered any questions we had but the ridiculous resort they change at the spot yet during our stay all pools were closed for private events which was not okay since they charge for them
Attended a concert at the Joint and the venue was perfect
The Joint is one of absolute favorite venues and I look forward to returning again and again no matter the name on the resort
The venue for our concert was literally right inside if you keep walking far enough
Five stars for the convert venue one star for everything else
The music venue for our concert was right in the hotel
Great casino great atmosphere best music venue
One of the fabulous valets allowed me to take it so I could go to the conference I was there for and also meet up with some friends who flew in from out of town to be with me
Amazing events cosy place big area great decoration just Everything was so wonderful
